Master Business English

with David Botte

Welcome to the home of Learning English with David for business and professionals. This corner of the website is broken down into four parts:

  • Resources for Learning, Maintainng, and Improving Your Business English Skills
  • Resources for Business English Exams
  • A timely updated list of links some may find worth investigating
  • A blog I created for both language purposes and to share some perspective between myself, students, and fellow teachers.
